31namespace webrtc {
32namespace {
33
34constexpr int kMinBaseMinimumDelayMs = 0;
35constexpr int kMaxBaseMinimumDelayMs = 10000;
36constexpr int kDelayBuckets = 100;
37constexpr int kBucketSizeMs = 20;
38constexpr int kStartDelayMs = 80;
39constexpr int kMaxNumReorderedPackets = 5;
40
41struct DelayManagerConfig {
42 double quantile = 0.97;
43 double forget_factor = 0.9993;
44 absl::optional<double> start_forget_weight = 2;
45 absl::optional<int> resample_interval_ms;
46 int max_history_ms = 2000;
47
48 std::unique_ptr<webrtc::StructParametersParser> Parser() {
49 return webrtc::StructParametersParser::Create( //
50 "quantile", &quantile, //
51 "forget_factor", &forget_factor, //
52 "start_forget_weight", &start_forget_weight, //
53 "resample_interval_ms", &resample_interval_ms, //
54 "max_history_ms", &max_history_ms);
55 }
56
57 // TODO(jakobi): remove legacy field trial.
58 void MaybeUpdateFromLegacyFieldTrial() {
59 constexpr char kDelayHistogramFieldTrial[] =
60 "WebRTC-Audio-NetEqDelayHistogram";
61 if (!webrtc::field_trial::IsEnabled(kDelayHistogramFieldTrial)) {
62 return;
63 }
64 const auto field_trial_string =
65 webrtc::field_trial::FindFullName(kDelayHistogramFieldTrial);
66 double percentile = -1.0;
67 double forget_factor = -1.0;
68 double start_forget_weight = -1.0;
69 if (sscanf(field_trial_string.c_str(), "Enabled-%lf-%lf-%lf", &percentile,
70 &forget_factor, &start_forget_weight) >= 2 &&
71 percentile >= 0.0 && percentile <= 100.0 && forget_factor >= 0.0 &&
72 forget_factor <= 1.0) {
73 this->quantile = percentile / 100;
74 this->forget_factor = forget_factor;
75 this->start_forget_weight = start_forget_weight >= 1
76 ? absl::make_optional(start_forget_weight)
77 : absl::nullopt;
78 }
79 }
80
81 explicit DelayManagerConfig() {
82 Parser()->Parse(webrtc::field_trial::FindFullName(
83 "WebRTC-Audio-NetEqDelayManagerConfig"));
84 MaybeUpdateFromLegacyFieldTrial();
85 RTC_LOG(LS_INFO) << "Delay manager config:"
86 " quantile="
87 << quantile << " forget_factor=" << forget_factor
88 << " start_forget_weight="
89 << start_forget_weight.value_or(0)
90 << " resample_interval_ms="
91 << resample_interval_ms.value_or(0)
92 << " max_history_ms=" << max_history_ms;
93 }
94};
95
96} // namespace
97
98DelayManager::DelayManager(int max_packets_in_buffer,
99 int base_minimum_delay_ms,
100 int histogram_quantile,
101 absl::optional<int> resample_interval_ms,
102 int max_history_ms,
103 const TickTimer* tick_timer,
104 std::unique_ptr<Histogram> histogram)
105 : first_packet_received_(false),
106 max_packets_in_buffer_(max_packets_in_buffer),
107 histogram_(std::move(histogram)),
108 histogram_quantile_(histogram_quantile),
109 tick_timer_(tick_timer),
110 resample_interval_ms_(resample_interval_ms),
111 max_history_ms_(max_history_ms),
112 base_minimum_delay_ms_(base_minimum_delay_ms),
113 effective_minimum_delay_ms_(base_minimum_delay_ms),
114 minimum_delay_ms_(0),
115 maximum_delay_ms_(0),
116 target_level_ms_(kStartDelayMs),
117 last_timestamp_(0) {
118 RTC_CHECK(histogram_);
119 RTC_DCHECK_GE(base_minimum_delay_ms_, 0);
120
121 Reset();
122}
123
124std::unique_ptr<DelayManager> DelayManager::Create(
125 int max_packets_in_buffer,
126 int base_minimum_delay_ms,
127 const TickTimer* tick_timer) {
128 DelayManagerConfig config;
129 int forget_factor_q15 = (1 << 15) * config.forget_factor;
130 int quantile_q30 = (1 << 30) * config.quantile;
131 std::unique_ptr<Histogram> histogram = std::make_unique<Histogram>(
132 kDelayBuckets, forget_factor_q15, config.start_forget_weight);
133 return std::make_unique<DelayManager>(
134 max_packets_in_buffer, base_minimum_delay_ms, quantile_q30,
135 config.resample_interval_ms, config.max_history_ms, tick_timer,
136 std::move(histogram));
137}
138
139DelayManager::~DelayManager() {}
140
141absl::optional<int> DelayManager::Update(uint32_t timestamp,
142 int sample_rate_hz,
143 bool reset) {
144 if (sample_rate_hz <= 0) {
145 return absl::nullopt;
146 }
147
148 if (!first_packet_received_ || reset) {
149 // Restart relative delay esimation from this packet.
150 delay_history_.clear();
151 packet_iat_stopwatch_ = tick_timer_->GetNewStopwatch();
152 last_timestamp_ = timestamp;
153 first_packet_received_ = true;
154 num_reordered_packets_ = 0;
155 resample_stopwatch_ = tick_timer_->GetNewStopwatch();
156 max_delay_in_interval_ms_ = 0;
157 return absl::nullopt;
158 }
159
160 const int expected_iat_ms =
161 1000ll * static_cast<int32_t>(timestamp - last_timestamp_) /
162 sample_rate_hz;
163 const int iat_ms = packet_iat_stopwatch_->ElapsedMs();
164 const int iat_delay_ms = iat_ms - expected_iat_ms;
165 int relative_delay;
166 bool reordered = !IsNewerTimestamp(timestamp, last_timestamp_);
167 if (reordered) {
168 relative_delay = std::max(iat_delay_ms, 0);
169 } else {
170 UpdateDelayHistory(iat_delay_ms, timestamp, sample_rate_hz);
171 relative_delay = CalculateRelativePacketArrivalDelay();
172 }
173
174 absl::optional<int> histogram_update;
175 if (resample_interval_ms_) {
176 if (static_cast<int>(resample_stopwatch_->ElapsedMs()) >
177 *resample_interval_ms_) {
178 histogram_update = max_delay_in_interval_ms_;
179 resample_stopwatch_ = tick_timer_->GetNewStopwatch();
180 max_delay_in_interval_ms_ = 0;
181 }
182 max_delay_in_interval_ms_ =
183 std::max(max_delay_in_interval_ms_, relative_delay);
184 } else {
185 histogram_update = relative_delay;
186 }
187 if (histogram_update) {
188 const int index = *histogram_update / kBucketSizeMs;
189 if (index < histogram_->NumBuckets()) {
190 // Maximum delay to register is 2000 ms.
191 histogram_->Add(index);
192 }
193 }
194
195 // Calculate new |target_level_ms_| based on updated statistics.
196 int bucket_index = histogram_->Quantile(histogram_quantile_);
197 target_level_ms_ = (1 + bucket_index) * kBucketSizeMs;
198 target_level_ms_ = std::max(target_level_ms_, effective_minimum_delay_ms_);
199 if (maximum_delay_ms_ > 0) {
200 target_level_ms_ = std::min(target_level_ms_, maximum_delay_ms_);
201 }
202 if (packet_len_ms_ > 0) {
203 // Target level should be at least one packet.
204 target_level_ms_ = std::max(target_level_ms_, packet_len_ms_);
205 // Limit to 75% of maximum buffer size.
206 target_level_ms_ = std::min(
207 target_level_ms_, 3 * max_packets_in_buffer_ * packet_len_ms_ / 4);
208 }
209
210 // Prepare for next packet arrival.
211 if (reordered) {
212 // Allow a small number of reordered packets before resetting the delay
213 // estimation.
214 if (num_reordered_packets_ < kMaxNumReorderedPackets) {
215 ++num_reordered_packets_;
216 return relative_delay;
217 }
218 delay_history_.clear();
219 }
220 num_reordered_packets_ = 0;
221 packet_iat_stopwatch_ = tick_timer_->GetNewStopwatch();
222 last_timestamp_ = timestamp;
223 return relative_delay;
224}
225
226void DelayManager::UpdateDelayHistory(int iat_delay_ms,
227 uint32_t timestamp,
228 int sample_rate_hz) {
229 PacketDelay delay;
230 delay.iat_delay_ms = iat_delay_ms;
231 delay.timestamp = timestamp;
232 delay_history_.push_back(delay);
233 while (timestamp - delay_history_.front().timestamp >
234 static_cast<uint32_t>(max_history_ms_ * sample_rate_hz / 1000)) {
235 delay_history_.pop_front();
236 }
237}
238
239int DelayManager::CalculateRelativePacketArrivalDelay() const {
240 // This effectively calculates arrival delay of a packet relative to the
241 // packet preceding the history window. If the arrival delay ever becomes
242 // smaller than zero, it means the reference packet is invalid, and we
243 // move the reference.
244 int relative_delay = 0;
245 for (const PacketDelay& delay : delay_history_) {
246 relative_delay += delay.iat_delay_ms;
247 relative_delay = std::max(relative_delay, 0);
248 }
249 return relative_delay;
250}
251
252int DelayManager::SetPacketAudioLength(int length_ms) {
253 if (length_ms <= 0) {
254 RTC_LOG_F(LS_ERROR) << "length_ms = " << length_ms;
255 return -1;
256 }
257 packet_len_ms_ = length_ms;
258 return 0;
259}
260
261void DelayManager::Reset() {
262 packet_len_ms_ = 0;
263 histogram_->Reset();
264 delay_history_.clear();
265 target_level_ms_ = kStartDelayMs;
266 packet_iat_stopwatch_ = tick_timer_->GetNewStopwatch();
267 first_packet_received_ = false;
268 num_reordered_packets_ = 0;
269 resample_stopwatch_ = tick_timer_->GetNewStopwatch();
270 max_delay_in_interval_ms_ = 0;
271}
272
273int DelayManager::TargetDelayMs() const {
274 return target_level_ms_;
275}
276
277bool DelayManager::IsValidMinimumDelay(int delay_ms) const {
278 return 0 <= delay_ms && delay_ms <= MinimumDelayUpperBound();
279}
280
281bool DelayManager::IsValidBaseMinimumDelay(int delay_ms) const {
282 return kMinBaseMinimumDelayMs <= delay_ms &&
283 delay_ms <= kMaxBaseMinimumDelayMs;
284}
285
286bool DelayManager::SetMinimumDelay(int delay_ms) {
287 if (!IsValidMinimumDelay(delay_ms)) {
288 return false;
289 }
290
291 minimum_delay_ms_ = delay_ms;
292 UpdateEffectiveMinimumDelay();
293 return true;
294}
295
296bool DelayManager::SetMaximumDelay(int delay_ms) {
297 // If |delay_ms| is zero then it unsets the maximum delay and target level is
298 // unconstrained by maximum delay.
299 if (delay_ms != 0 &&
300 (delay_ms < minimum_delay_ms_ || delay_ms < packet_len_ms_)) {
301 // Maximum delay shouldn't be less than minimum delay or less than a packet.
302 return false;
303 }
304
305 maximum_delay_ms_ = delay_ms;
306 UpdateEffectiveMinimumDelay();
307 return true;
308}
309
310bool DelayManager::SetBaseMinimumDelay(int delay_ms) {
311 if (!IsValidBaseMinimumDelay(delay_ms)) {
312 return false;
313 }
314
315 base_minimum_delay_ms_ = delay_ms;
316 UpdateEffectiveMinimumDelay();
317 return true;
318}
319
320int DelayManager::GetBaseMinimumDelay() const {
321 return base_minimum_delay_ms_;
322}
323
324void DelayManager::UpdateEffectiveMinimumDelay() {
325 // Clamp |base_minimum_delay_ms_| into the range which can be effectively
326 // used.
327 const int base_minimum_delay_ms =
328 rtc::SafeClamp(base_minimum_delay_ms_, 0, MinimumDelayUpperBound());
329 effective_minimum_delay_ms_ =
330 std::max(minimum_delay_ms_, base_minimum_delay_ms);
331}
332
333int DelayManager::MinimumDelayUpperBound() const {
334 // Choose the lowest possible bound discarding 0 cases which mean the value
335 // is not set and unconstrained.
336 int q75 = max_packets_in_buffer_ * packet_len_ms_ * 3 / 4;
337 q75 = q75 > 0 ? q75 : kMaxBaseMinimumDelayMs;
338 const int maximum_delay_ms =
339 maximum_delay_ms_ > 0 ? maximum_delay_ms_ : kMaxBaseMinimumDelayMs;
340 return std::min(maximum_delay_ms, q75);
341}
342
343} // namespace webrtc
